details.description: Search for a personalised number plate registration and buy it from DVLA online or at auction
details.more_information:
Personalised registration numbers can only be used on a vehicle registered (or about to be registered), taxed and used in Great Britain.

^When you buy a personalised registration number, you're buying the right to [assign this number](/personalised-vehicle-registration-numbers/assigning-a-personalised-number-to-a-vehicle "assign a personalised number to a vehicle") to a vehicle registered in your name or someone else's name (the nominee).^
details.introduction:
You can buy a personalised registration for your number plates from DVLA online or at auction. Search online to see which numbers are available and how much they cost.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
details.alternate_methods:
##Registration number auctions

[DVLA Personalised Registrations](http://dvlaregistrations.direct.gov.uk/auction/ "DVLA Personalised Registrations"){:rel="external"} also auctions some exclusive registration numbers. Auctions are held about 6 times a year and reserve prices start from Â£250. You can bid online, in person, by phone or in writing.

##Private sales

You can also buy a personalised registration number from a dealer or from a motorist in a private sale. If you do this, make sure you receive the V750 certificate of entitlement or V778 certificate of retention.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
